text: Lawrence Michael "Larry" Smith (June 11, 1952 â€“ December 18, 2014) was an American musician and hip hop record producer. He was best known for his co- productions (with Russell Simmons) of Run-DMC's Run-D.M.C. (1984) and King of Rock (1985) and his solo production of Whodini's Escape (1984) and Back in Black (1986). Smith died on December 18, 2014 in Flushing, Queens, New York, 63. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Larry Smith (producer)
